resources.string: Enter the world of deduction and strategy with Mastermind! Your objective is to crack the hidden color code within 8 attempts. Select your guess by choosing colors for each slot, then submit to see how close you are. Black pegs indicate correct colors in the correct position, while white pegs signify correct colors in the wrong position. Use the feedback to refine your strategy and crack the code. A vertical screen position is recommended.
This is just an Example game. The task of the game is to test the correctness of inserting trials into the database.

Fast Math is an engaging educational app that challenges you to solve math problems quickly. Choose from easy, medium, or hard levels and race against the clock to answer correctly. Earn points for each correct answer and aim to beat your high score. Perfect for sharpening arithmetic skills and enjoying a fun mental workout. A vertical screen position is recommended.
You can visit our page www.logic_games.com!
